setting.location: Common room of research station orbiting planet Solaris

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair, alert posture, professional demeanor
characters.clothing: Clean futuristic uniform, hands clasped behind back
characters.position: Standing near entrance, maintaining respectful distance
characters.action: Observing and assessing the other crew members with scientific objectivity

characters.appearance: Man, 40s, gray hair, haggard features, sunken eyes, exhausted slump
characters.position: Slouched in chair at table, head resting on one hand
characters.action: Looking up wearily, fatigue evident in every gesture

characters.appearance: Man, 50s, tall and thin, nervous energy, distracted expression
characters.clothing: Neat but worn uniform, constantly adjusting sleeves
characters.position: Standing near wall controls, shifting weight nervously
characters.action: Glancing between newcomer and equipment panels, avoiding direct eye contact

scene.mainElements: Station common room with curved walls, functional furniture, multiple control panels, overhead lighting casting soft shadows
scene.details: Metal table with scattered papers, empty cups, worn chair cushions, wall-mounted screens showing data readings, ventilation system humming, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Room extends to show additional equipment alcoves, glimpses of corridor beyond, subtle wear patterns on walls and floors
scene.atmosphere: Underlying tension, psychological fatigue, professional courtesy masking deeper concerns, sense of prolonged isolation wearing on the crew

composition.cameraAngle: Medium wide shot capturing all three characters
composition.focus: Contrast between newcomer's alertness and crew's exhaustion
composition.depth: Characters positioned at different distances creating triangular composition, room architecture providing context
